product add */export var productAdd=function productAdd(product,history){return{type:PRODUCT_ADD,payload:{product:product,history:history}};};export var productAddSuccess=function getSelectedProductError(error){return{type:SELECTED_PRODUCT_ERROR,payload:{},error:error};};/* product updated */export var productUpdate=function data */export var allSeller=function allSeller(history){return{type:ALL_SELLERS,payload:{history:history}};};export var allSellerSuccess=function
